collection.title: Collection
collection.introduction:
UNIQUE - SUSTAINABLE - CRAFTSMANSHIP - TIMELESS with SURPRISING ACCENTS

The Aimant, Maisa, HaHaHandbag and the classic doctor's bag models are available to order.

The permanent color collection can be found per model, with your order I will contact you about the color of the haberdashery, the leather on the magnets and the length of the strap. On request you can also have your name printed in the bag.

aimant.title: Aimant
aimant.description:
A sturdy handbag in vegetable tanned leather with a large volume.
The flap closes with 3 magnets that can be covered in a different color as desired.
The bottom has 4 legs and the shoulder strap is adjustable.
aimant.detail-description:
Dimensions: W 26.5 cm - H 20 cm - D 8 cm

Available in
• brown with magnets in red leather and bronze fittings, the shoulder strap is min. 99 cm and max. 110 cm
• blue with magnets in eggplant and bronze fittings, the shoulder strap is min. 96 cm and max. 110 cm

Price: 475 euros

aimant-small.title: Aimant small
aimant-small.description:
A sturdy handbag made of vegetable tanned leather.
The flap closes with 2 magnets that can be covered in a different color as desired.
The small version does not contain bag feet as standard.
aimant-small.detail-description:
Dimensions: W 20.50 cm - H 16 cm - D 7 cm (narrowing)

Available in
• pink and natural with matt silver fittings, the shoulder strap is min. 98 cm and max. 110 cm
• blue and aubergine with gold fittings, the shoulder strap is min. 98 cm and max. 110 cm

Price: 395 euros

maisa.title: Maisa
maisa.description:
A playful handbag in supple vegetable tanned leather. The bag closes with a flap that contains two blind magnets. The bag is light and super handy for daily use. You can choose between a small and medium version. A zippered bag can be incorporated upon request. The strap is attached to the bag in 3 different ways.

1. at fixed length
2. one side fixed and the other adjustable with gun buttons
3. adjustable on both sides with gun buttons
maisa.detail-description:
Dimensions Maisa small: W 24 cm - H 16 cm - D 11 cm (narrower)

Directly available in
• pink with matt silver fittings and inner pocket with zipper, adjustable strap on one side: 96cm up to 101cm (can be adjusted to your preference)
310 euros
• natural with red accents and silver-colored fittings, fixed belt of 100cm (can be adjusted to wish)
275 euro

Dimensions Maisa medium: W 26.50 cm - H 20 cm - D 11 cm (tapering)

Color chart Maisa: vegetable tanned leather type 'Vegline '
bottle green - soft pink - emerald green - chocolate brown - rust - mimosa (natural)

other colors/leather types on request

hahahandtas.title: HaHaHandtas
hahahandtas.description: This handbag combines features of both the Aimant and the Maisa. It is made of sturdy saddle leather and closes with a luxurious Excella zipper. She got her name thanks to the letter H with which the loops in the bag are incorporated. This handbag is basic (sleek shape and no inside pockets) and luxurious at the same time thanks to the attention to detail and the gold zipper.
hahahandtas.detail-description:
Dimensions W 26 cm - H 20 cm - D 10 cm (narrower at the top)

Available to order in green, brown, petrol or pink

Price on request

dokterstas.title: Doctor's bag
dokterstas.description: This is a real classic among handbags. The bag owes its typical shape to the curved ribs with which the bag closes.
dokterstas.detail-description: I only make the doctor's bag to order. Together we will go over all the details of your custom version and then I will make it especially for you.

belt.title: Belt in harness leather
belt.description: Craftsmanship and simplicity... these words tell everything about the belt. This belt is made from one layer of thick saddle leather and is sewn by hand. My belts are characterized by the asymmetrical punch.
belt.detail-description:
The buckles are of very good quality and a belt will last for years. I only make these belts to size. Please provide the correct circumference and indicate whether you close the belts to the left or to the right (from your own point of view). Due to the labor-intensive nature (manual polishing of the saddle leather), the number of belts I make per month is limited.

A custom belt costs 120 euros.

wallet.title: Wallet Jade
wallet.description: A handy and compact wallet for both cards and change. Made of vegetable tanned leather (55 euros) or steel furniture leather (40 euros)
wallet.detail-description:
color chart vegetable tanned leather type 'Vegline'
bottle green - soft pink - emerald green - chocolate brown - rust - mimosa (natural)

care-maintenance.title: Care and maintenance
care-maintenance.veg-tan-description:
My choice for vegetable tanned leather is a choice for leather that 'lives', that develops its own patina over the years. In this way, my handbags carry your own story with them over time. This is in contrast to leather in which the characteristic features are concealed by a (thick) layer of paint that slowly wears off.

First of all, there are a number of properties of this leather that you should take into account. Vegetable tanned leather feels warm and allows all the natural properties of the skin to be visible. The colours are influenced by the outside. Only choose this leather and you know that with use the colour of your bag will change and become warmer. The bright fresh colours deepen and become less pronounced.

This beautiful leather is a luxury product for the enthusiast, as only 10 percent of all skins qualify for this. Vegetable tanning agents are used for the tanning process, non-toxic and not harmful to the environment. Because the paint penetrates the leather completely, you do not have a thick covering layer of paint that conceals all the properties of the material. On the contrary, due to the dyeing method, you can also see the wrinkles, scars and possible color differences and small imperfections in this leather. It is a conscious choice to work with this and to express these characteristic properties in every handbag.

My choice for vegetable tanned leather leads to extra attention for the maintenance of your bag. Please note that small scratches and spots can occur with this leather, this is part of the properties of the leather. The leather will also discolor and darken over time. Because the leather does not have a heavy finish, it is also more sensitive to water. After contact with water, carefully pat the bag dry with a soft cloth and let it dry at room temperature, but above all ensure good protection against the rain.

I only work with cowhide for my handbags and not with exotic leathers. The leather is of European origin and only comes from hides that are the residual product of the meat industry. The leather of this handbag carries a quality label that stands for craftsmanship and durability.
care-maintenance.care-maintenance-item1: Treat the leather against rain before use and let it dry for 12 to 24 hours. Choose a spray with nanotechnology. Repeat this every 3 to 6 months
care-maintenance.care-maintenance-item2: Regularly treat your handbag with a nourishing cream or leather milk such as Saphir Crème Universelle. Let it soak in well and then rub. When the bag feels dry again, spray it again against rain
care-maintenance.care-maintenance-item3: Take care of your handbag and do not overfill it
care-maintenance.care-maintenance-item4: Be careful with grease, perfume or hand gel
care-maintenance.care-maintenance-item5: Avoid contact between dark clothing and light-coloured leather and between dark leather and light-coloured clothing, to prevent colour transfer
care-maintenance.care-maintenance-item6: Do not expose the bag to direct sunlight or heat to prevent the leather from fading or discolouring
care-maintenance.care-maintenance-item7: When not in use, store your handbag in a cloth bag away from light

about-me.title: The creator
about-me.introduction1:
I'm Hester and I have been making handbags and accessories in leather for more than 10 years. During that time I developed a preference for vegetable tanned leather. My collection of handbags was inspired by this honest and sustainable material. I make the bags that I want myself... nice leather, few shiny haberdashery and easy to use. Preferably with an extra detail that makes you happy. And you can see this in the colored magnets that appear in my models.

If you wish to order a handbag, this is done by email to me. This way you can choose a number of features yourself, such as the colors of the details and haberdashery, the construction of the shoulder strap and its length.

For me, personal contact is important. I like to know where my bag will end up and who I'm making it for.
about-me.introduction2:
If you have any questions, send me a message and I will contact you. If you would like to come and have a look in my studio, this is possible by appointment.

I live with Jimmy and our 3 cats in Rosmeer. In addition to working in my studio, I teach at Cursa, where you can follow the four-year leather worker course. I also work part-time at CC Lanaken where I program youth performances and classical concerts, among other things. I love music, visiting cities, cooking for friends and family and good food.


See you soon,
Hester


P.S. When I'm at work I don't always answer the phone. Leave a message and I will call you back.
